фамилия Фанат; шаблон; модель; пример
rtega_mnemonic:

  • pattern into which the water flows while spreading in a flood 氾 through the vegetation 艹
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 範, 范)
Pictophonetic: 氾 indicates the sound; 艹 (plant) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
范围 [ fàn wéi ]: range; scope; limit; extent; Classifiers: 个

模范 [ mó fàn ]: model; fine example
防范 [ fáng fàn ]: to be on guard; wariness; to guard against; preventive

    • 氾 [ fàn ] to flood, to inundate, to overflow
heisig_chinese_memo: We have technology for making a fingerprint model now, but back in the day they would mix up some water with flowers and take your fingerprints by having you dip your finger in that substance before pressing it on a piece of paper and fanning it.
Ru_trainchinese:
fàn: (графема) образец, модель, пример; граница, предел; (книжн.) контролировать, ограничивать
fàn: (графема) Фань (фамилия)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This pattern made of bamboo is for a new model of car designed to leave as small an ecological fingerprint as possible.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "艸" to " pan " sound. The original meaning is the cursive name. "Shuowen": "Fan, Cha Ye. From Cha, Fansheng." It is also the name of an insect, a kind of bee. "Book of Rites. "Tan Gongxia": "Silkworms have performance and crabs have Kuang, Fan has crowns and cicadas have 緌." Zheng Xuan's note: "Fans, bees." Kong Yingdashu: "There are things on bees heads that look like crowns." "Book of Rites. "Nei Ze": "Jue, 鷐, 蜩, Fan." Lu Deming explained: "Fan, 𧒒. 𧒒, the original is also a bee." For example, Luo Yin in the Tang Dynasty "Cricket": "Fan Shuichan is old, the crown is good."

" Fan " is also commonly referred to as " fan " and "笵". Such as "Xunzi. "Strengthening the country": "Xing Fanzheng, Jin Ximei, skillful workmanship, all fires, but no evil." Wang Xianqian gathered and quoted Hao Yixing and said: "Xing is the same as the type, and the fan and the 笵 are the same, both are the methods of casting utensils. Also." Another example is "Taixuan. "Wen": "Second Sixth, Hongwen has no fan, and he is in Chuan." Fan Wang's note: "Fan, Faye." "Tai Xuan. "Du": "Second six, magnanimous inspection, show the image in the sky, follow the model." Sima Guang's notes: "Fan, the same as Fan."

" Fan " is also a common surname, such as the Vietnamese doctor Fan Li in the late Spring and Autumn Period, the Qin prime minister Fan Sui during the Warring States Period, the Southern Song historian Fan Ye, the Northern Song politician Fan Zhongyan, and the Southern Song poet Fan Chengda.
humanum_short_description_en: From "艸" to " pan " sound. The original meaning is the name of grass and the name of insects.
humanum_full_description:
從「艸」，「氾」聲。本義是草名。《說文》：「范，艸也。从艸，氾聲。」又是昆蟲之名，是蜂的一種。《禮記．檀弓下》：「蠶則績而蟹有匡，范則冠而蟬有緌。」鄭玄注：「范，蜂也。」孔穎達疏：「蜂頭上有物似冠也。」《禮記．內則》：「爵、鷐、蜩、范。」陸德明釋文：「范，𧒒。𧒒，本又作蜂。」如唐代羅隱〈蟋蟀〉：「范睡蟬老，冠峨緌好。」

　　「范」又通作「範」、「笵」。如《荀子．彊國》：「刑范正，金錫美，工冶巧，火齊得，剖刑而莫邪已。」王先謙集解引郝懿行曰：「刑與型同，范與笵同，皆鑄作器物之法也。」又如《太玄．文》：「次六，鴻文無范，恣于川。」范望注：「范，法也。」《太玄．度》：「次六，大度檢檢，于天示象，垂其范。」司馬光集注：「范，與範同。」

　　「范」也是常見的姓氏，如春秋末年越國大夫范蠡、戰國時期秦國宰相范睢、南朝宋史學家范曄、北宋政治家范仲淹、南宋詩人范成大等。
humanum_short_description: 從「艸」，「氾」聲。本義是草名，又是昆蟲之名。

從「 艸 」，「 氾 」聲。本義是草名。《說文》：「范，艸也。从艸，氾聲。」又是昆蟲之名，是蜂的一種。《禮記．檀弓下》：「蠶則績而蟹有匡，范則冠而蟬有緌。」鄭玄注：「范，蜂也。」孔穎達疏：「蜂頭上有物似冠也。」《禮記．內則》：「爵、鷐、蜩、范。」陸德明釋文：「范，𧒒。𧒒，本又作蜂。」如唐代羅隱〈蟋蟀〉：「范睡蟬老，冠峨緌好。」 「 范 」又通作「 範 」、「 笵 」。如《荀子．彊國》：「刑范正，金錫美，工冶巧，火齊得，剖刑而莫邪已。」王先謙集解引郝懿行曰：「刑與型同，范與笵同，皆鑄作器物之法也。」又如《太玄．文》：「次六，鴻文無范，恣于川。」范望注：「范，法也。」《太玄．度》：「次六，大度檢檢，于天示象，垂其范。」司馬光集注：「范，與範同。」 「 范 」也是常見的姓氏，如春秋末年越國大夫范蠡、戰國時期秦國宰相范睢、南朝宋史學家范曄、北宋政治家范仲淹、南宋詩人范成大等。
From " 艸" to " pan" sound. The original meaning is the cursive name. "Shuowen": "Fan, Cha Ye. From Cha, Fansheng." It is also the name of an insect, a kind of bee. "Book of Rites. "Tan Gongxia": "Silkworms have performance and crabs have Kuang, Fan has crowns and cicadas have 緌." Zheng Xuan's note: "Fans, bees." Kong Yingdashu: "There are things on bees heads that look like crowns." "Book of Rites. "Nei Ze": "Jue, 鷐, 蜩, Fan." Lu Deming explained: "Fan, 𧒒. 𧒒, the original is also a bee." For example, Luo Yin in the Tang Dynasty "Cricket": "Fan Shuichan is old, the crown is good." " Fan" is also commonly referred to as " fan" and " 笵". Such as "Xunzi. "Strengthening the country": "Xing Fanzheng, Jin Ximei, skillful workmanship, all fires, but no evil." Wang Xianqian gathered and quoted Hao Yixing and said: "Xing is the same as the type, and the fan and the 笵 are the same, both are the methods of casting utensils. Also." Another example is "Taixuan. "Wen": "Second Sixth, Hongwen has no fan, and he is in Chuan." Fan Wang's note: "Fan, Faye." "Tai Xuan. "Du": "Second six, magnanimous inspection, show the image in the sky, follow the model." Sima Guang's notes: "Fan, the same as Fan." " Fan" is also a common surname, such as the Vietnamese doctor Fan Li in the late Spring and Autumn Period, the Qin prime minister Fan Sui during the Warring States Period, the Southern Song historian Fan Ye, the Northern Song politician Fan Zhongyan, and the Southern Song poet Fan Chengda.

范字的基本解释

范
（範）
fàn
模子：铜范。铁范。
榜样：模范。典范。
一定界限：范围。范畴（ａ．类型；范围；ｂ．概念性最高的基本概念，如“化合”、“分解”是化学的范畴；“矛盾”、“质”和“量”等是哲学的范畴）。规范。
限制：防范。
姓。

范字的源字形
范字的起名意思

：指典范，模范，楷模，榜样，如轨物范世；也指用模子浇铸，引申为规范。

Fan
Basic explanation of words
Fan
(Fan)
fàn
Model: Copper Fan. Tiefan.
Role model: model. model.
Certain boundaries: scope. Category (a. Type; scope; b. The most conceptual basic concepts, such as "combination" and "decomposition" are the categories of chemistry; "contradiction", "quality" and "quantity" are the categories of philosophy). specification.
Restrictions: prevention.
name.
Fan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
Fan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
Fan
Source glyph
Fan
Name meaning
: Refers to model, model, role model, role model, such as the model world; also refers to casting with a mold, extended to be the norm.
fàn
I сущ.
1) образец, модель, эталон, стандарт, шаблон; клише; правило, закон
钱范 клише для печатания денежных знаков
模范 образец, стандарт, эталон
无范 закону, не по правилу
2) рамки; ограниченный рамками
就范 ввести (уложиться) в соответствующие (нужные) рамки
3) вм. 笵 (бамбуковая форма)
II гл.
плавить; лить, отливать (из металла)
笵金合土 отливать из металла и лепить из глины
III собств.
Фань (фамилия)
